title: Leave buster
body: I never left my last match yet it gave me a 20 min leave buster please help me out I only get 1 hour periods to play and with this 20 min buster I cant play

replies.body: Hey, it looks like you left a match earlier as Warwick earlier.  If you're having any issues causing you to leave I'd be happy to help, but we aren't able to reset [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).  I know you don't get a lot of time to play, but the system would only trigger as a result of more than 1 leave, so let me know if you're running into tech issues.

hello my dudes i seem to have a problem
so unfortunately i have also received a 20 minute leave buster as clearly shown lagging right out because my internet is trash, i can accept that leaver buster as it is my fault.but i am also wondering why i cant make it through the 20 minutes before it randomly cancels forcing me to reset the timer and i cannot do anything about it
